00043         public static bool IsGraphic(string FileName)
00044         {
00045             System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex Regex = new System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex(@"\.gif$|\.jpg$|\.jpeg$|\.png$|\.bmp$", System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);
00046             if (Regex.IsMatch(FileName))
00047             {
00048                 return true;
00049             }
00050             else
00051             {
00052                 return false;
00053             }
00054         }

00062         public static ImageFormat GetFormat(string FileName)
00063         {
00064             if (FileName.EndsWith("jpg", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) || FileName.EndsWith("jpeg", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00065                 return ImageFormat.Jpeg;
00066             if (FileName.EndsWith("png", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00067                 return ImageFormat.Png;
00068             if (FileName.EndsWith("tiff", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00069                 return ImageFormat.Tiff;
00070             if (FileName.EndsWith("ico", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00071                 return ImageFormat.Icon;
00072             if (FileName.EndsWith("gif", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00073                 return ImageFormat.Gif;
00074             return ImageFormat.Bmp;
00075         }

00083         public static void GetDimensions(string FileName, out int Width, out int Height)
00084         {
00085             if (!IsGraphic(FileName))
00086             {
00087                 Width = 0;
00088                 Height = 0;
00089                 return;
00090             }
00091             System.Drawing.Image TempImage = System.Drawing.Image.FromFile(FileName);
00092             Width = TempImage.Width;
00093             Height = TempImage.Height;
00094             TempImage.Dispose();
00095         }

00143         public static Bitmap CropImage(string FileName, int Width, int Height, Image.Align VAlignment, Image.Align HAlignment)
00144         {

00146                 return new Bitmap(1, 1);

00149             System.Drawing.Bitmap ReturnImage=Image.CropImage(TempBitmap, Width, Height, VAlignment, HAlignment);
00150             TempBitmap.Dispose();
00151             TempImage.Dispose();

00164         public static Bitmap CropImage(Bitmap ImageUsing, int Width, int Height, Image.Align VAlignment, Image.Align HAlignment)
00165         {
00166             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = ImageUsing;
00167             System.Drawing.Rectangle TempRectangle = new System.Drawing.Rectangle();
00168             TempRectangle.Height = Height;
00169             TempRectangle.Width = Width;
00170             if (VAlignment == Image.Align.Top)
00171             {
00172                 TempRectangle.Y = 0;
00173             }
00174             else
00175             {
00176                 TempRectangle.Y = TempBitmap.Height - Height;
00177                 if (TempRectangle.Y < 0)
00178                     TempRectangle.Y = 0;
00179             }
00180             if (HAlignment == Image.Align.Left)
00181             {
00182                 TempRectangle.X = 0;
00183             }
00184             else
00185             {
00186                 TempRectangle.X = TempBitmap.Width - Width;
00187                 if (TempRectangle.X < 0)
00188                     TempRectangle.X = 0;
00189             }
00190             System.Drawing.Bitmap CroppedBitmap = TempBitmap.Clone(TempRectangle, TempBitmap.PixelFormat);
00191             return CroppedBitmap;
00192         }

00248         public static Bitmap ResizeImage(Bitmap Image, int MaxSide)
00249         {
00250             try
00251             {
00252                 System.Drawing.Image TempImage = Image;
00253                 int NewWidth;
00254                 int NewHeight;
00255 
00256                 System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat ImageFormat = TempImage.RawFormat;
00257 
00258                 int OldWidth = TempImage.Width;
00259                 int OldHeight = TempImage.Height;
00260 
00261                 int OldMaxSide;
00262 
00263                 if (OldWidth >= OldHeight)
00264                 {
00265                     OldMaxSide = OldWidth;
00266                 }
00267                 else
00268                 {
00269                     OldMaxSide = OldHeight;
00270                 }
00271 
00272                 if (OldMaxSide > MaxSide)
00273                 {
00274                     double Coefficient = (double)MaxSide / (double)OldMaxSide;
00275                     NewWidth = Convert.ToInt32(Coefficient * OldWidth);
00276                     NewHeight = Convert.ToInt32(Coefficient * OldHeight);
00277                     if (NewWidth <= 0)
00278                         NewWidth = 1;
00279                     if (NewHeight <= 0)
00280                         NewHeight = 1;
00281                 }
00282                 else
00283                 {
00284                     NewHeight = OldHeight;
00285                     NewWidth = OldWidth;
00286                 }
00287 
00288                 System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempImage, NewWidth, NewHeight);
00289                 return TempBitmap;
00290             }
00291             catch (Exception a)
00292             {
00293                 throw a;
00294             }
00295         }

00399         public static Bitmap Rotate(Bitmap Image, float DegreesToRotate)
00400         {
00401             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
00402             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00403             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00404 
00405             NewGraphics.TranslateTransform((float)TempBitmap.Width / 2.0f, (float)TempBitmap.Height / 2.0f);
00406             NewGraphics.RotateTransform(DegreesToRotate);
00407             NewGraphics.TranslateTransform(-(float)TempBitmap.Width / 2.0f, -(float)TempBitmap.Height / 2.0f);
00408             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00409             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00410             return NewBitmap;
00411         }

00451         public static Bitmap ConvertBlackAndWhite(Bitmap Image)
00452         {

00454 
00455             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00456             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00457             float[][] FloatColorMatrix ={
00458                     new float[] {.3f, .3f, .3f, 0, 0},
00459                     new float[] {.59f, .59f, .59f, 0, 0},
00460                     new float[] {.11f, .11f, .11f, 0, 0},
00461                     new float[] {0, 0, 0, 1, 0},
00462                     new float[] {0, 0, 0, 0, 1}
00463                 };
00464 
00465             System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix NewColorMatrix = new System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix(FloatColorMatrix);
00466             System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes Attributes = new System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes();
00467             Attributes.SetColorMatrix(NewColorMatrix);
00468             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), 0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height, System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel, Attributes);
00469             Attributes.Dispose();
00470             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00471             return NewBitmap;

00514         public static Bitmap Threshold(Bitmap Image, float Threshold)
00515         {
00516             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
00517 
00518             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00519             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00520             for (int x = 0; x < TempBitmap.Width; ++x)
00521             {
00522                 for (int y = 0; y < TempBitmap.Height; ++y)
00523                 {
00524                     Color TempColor = TempBitmap.GetPixel(x, y);
00525                     if ((TempColor.R + TempColor.G + TempColor.B) / 755.0f > Threshold)
00526                     {
00527                         TempBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, Color.White);
00528                     }
00529                     else
00530                     {
00531                         TempBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, Color.Black);
00532                     }
00533                 }
00534             }
00535             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), 0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height, System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00536             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00537             return NewBitmap;
00538         }

00570         public static Bitmap Watermark(string FileName, string WatermarkFileName, float Opacity, int X, int Y, Color KeyColor)
00571         {

00573                 return new Bitmap(1, 1);

00575             System.Drawing.Image TempWatermarkImage = System.Drawing.Image.FromFile(WatermarkFileName);
00576             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempImage, TempImage.Width, TempImage.Height);
00577             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempWatermarkBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempWatermarkImage, TempWatermarkImage.Width, TempWatermarkImage.Height);
00578             System.Drawing.Bitmap ReturnBitmap = Image.Watermark(TempBitmap, TempWatermarkBitmap, Opacity, X, Y, KeyColor);
00579             TempBitmap.Dispose();

00581             TempWatermarkImage.Dispose();
00582             TempImage.Dispose();

00596         public static Bitmap Watermark(Bitmap Image, Bitmap WatermarkImage, float Opacity, int X, int Y, Color KeyColor)
00597         {
00598             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
00599 
00600             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00601             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00602             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), 0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height, System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00603             float[][] FloatColorMatrix ={
00604                     new float[] {1, 0, 0, 0, 0},
00605                     new float[] {0, 1, 0, 0, 0},
00606                     new float[] {0, 0, 1, 0, 0},
00607                     new float[] {0, 0, 0, Opacity, 0},
00608                     new float[] {0, 0, 0, 0, 1}
00609                 };
00610 
00611             System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix NewColorMatrix = new System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix(FloatColorMatrix);
00612             System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes Attributes = new System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes();
00613             Attributes.SetColorMatrix(NewColorMatrix);
00614             if (KeyColor != null)
00615             {
00616                 Attributes.SetColorKey(KeyColor, KeyColor);
00617             }
00618             NewGraphics.DrawImage(WatermarkImage, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(X, Y, X + TempBitmap.Width, Y + TempBitmap.Height), 0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height, System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel, Attributes);
00619             Attributes.Dispose();
00620             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00621             return NewBitmap;
00622         }

00667         public static Bitmap Flip(Bitmap Image, bool FlipX, bool FlipY)
00668         {
00669             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
00670             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00671             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00672             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00673             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00674             if (FlipX && !FlipY)
00675             {
00676                 NewBitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipX);
00677             }
00678             else if (!FlipX && FlipY)
00679             {
00680                 NewBitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipY);
00681             }
00682             else if (FlipX && FlipY)
00683             {
00684                 NewBitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipXY);
00685             }
00686             return NewBitmap;
00687         }

00711         public static List<string> GetHTMLPalette(Bitmap Image)
00712         {
00713             List<string> ReturnArray = new List<string>();
00714             if (Image.Palette != null && Image.Palette.Entries.Length > 0)
00715             {
00716                 for (int x = 0; x < Image.Palette.Entries.Length; ++x)
00717                 {
00718                     string TempColor = ColorTranslator.ToHtml(Image.Palette.Entries[x]);
00719                     if (!ReturnArray.Contains(TempColor))
00720                     {
00721                         ReturnArray.Add(TempColor);
00722                     }
00723                 }
00724                 return ReturnArray;
00725             }
00726             for (int x = 0; x < Image.Width; ++x)
00727             {
00728                 for (int y = 0; y < Image.Height; ++y)
00729                 {
00730                     string TempColor = ColorTranslator.ToHtml(Image.GetPixel(x, y));
00731                     if (!ReturnArray.Contains(TempColor))
00732                     {
00733                         ReturnArray.Add(TempColor);
00734                     }
00735                 }
00736             }
00737             return ReturnArray;
00738         }

00780         public static Bitmap Pixelate(Bitmap Image, int PixelSize)
00781         {
00782             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
00783             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00784             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00785             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00786             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00787             int TempX = 0;
00788             int TempY = 0;
00789             while (true)
00790             {
00791                 int RValue = 0;
00792                 int GValue = 0;
00793                 int BValue = 0;
00794                 for (int x = TempX; x < TempX + PixelSize; ++x)
00795                 {
00796                     if (x >= NewBitmap.Width)
00797                         break;
00798                     for (int y = TempY; y < TempY + PixelSize; ++y)
00799                     {
00800                         if (y >= NewBitmap.Height)
00801                             break;
00802                         Color TempPixel = NewBitmap.GetPixel(x, y);
00803                         RValue += TempPixel.R;
00804                         GValue += TempPixel.G;
00805                         BValue += TempPixel.B;
00806                     }
00807                 }
00808                 RValue = RValue / (PixelSize * PixelSize);
00809                 GValue = GValue / (PixelSize * PixelSize);
00810                 BValue = BValue / (PixelSize * PixelSize);
00811                 for (int x = TempX; x < TempX + PixelSize; ++x)
00812                 {
00813                     if (x >= NewBitmap.Width)
00814                         break;
00815                     for (int y = TempY; y < TempY + PixelSize; ++y)
00816                     {
00817                         if (y >= NewBitmap.Height)
00818                             break;
00819                         NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, Color.FromArgb(RValue, GValue, BValue));
00820                     }
00821                 }
00822                 TempX += PixelSize;
00823                 if (TempX + PixelSize > NewBitmap.Width)
00824                 {
00825                     TempX = 0;
00826                     TempY += PixelSize;
00827                 }
00828                 if (TempY >= NewBitmap.Height)
00829                 {
00830                     break;
00831                 }
00832             }
00833             return NewBitmap;
00834         }
00835

00871 
00879         public static Bitmap EdgeDetection(Bitmap Image, float Threshold, Color EdgeColor)
00880         {
00881             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
00882             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00883             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00884             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00885             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00886             for (int x = 0; x < NewBitmap.Width; ++x)
00887             {
00888                 for (int y = 0; y < NewBitmap.Height; ++y)
00889                 {
00890                     bool EdgeSet = false;
00891                     Color CurrentColor = NewBitmap.GetPixel(x, y);
00892                     if (y < NewBitmap.Height - 1 && x < NewBitmap.Width - 1)
00893                     {
00894                         Color TempColor = NewBitmap.GetPixel(x + 1, y + 1);
00895                         if (Math.Sqrt(((CurrentColor.R - TempColor.R) * (CurrentColor.R - TempColor.R)) +
00896                             ((CurrentColor.G - TempColor.G) * (CurrentColor.G - TempColor.G)) +
00897                             ((CurrentColor.B - TempColor.B) * (CurrentColor.B - TempColor.B))) > Threshold)
00898                         {
00899                             NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, EdgeColor);
00900                         }
00901                         EdgeSet = true;
00902                     }
00903                     if (y < NewBitmap.Height - 1&&!EdgeSet)
00904                     {
00905                         Color TempColor = NewBitmap.GetPixel(x, y + 1);
00906                         if (Math.Sqrt(((CurrentColor.R - TempColor.R) * (CurrentColor.R - TempColor.R)) +
00907                             ((CurrentColor.G - TempColor.G) * (CurrentColor.G - TempColor.G)) +
00908                             ((CurrentColor.B - TempColor.B) * (CurrentColor.B - TempColor.B))) > Threshold)
00909                         {
00910                             NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, EdgeColor);
00911                         }
00912                         EdgeSet = true;
00913                     }
00914                     if (x < NewBitmap.Width - 1&&!EdgeSet)
00915                     {
00916                         Color TempColor = NewBitmap.GetPixel(x + 1, y);
00917                         if (Math.Sqrt(((CurrentColor.R - TempColor.R) * (CurrentColor.R - TempColor.R)) +
00918                             ((CurrentColor.G - TempColor.G) * (CurrentColor.G - TempColor.G)) +
00919                             ((CurrentColor.B - TempColor.B) * (CurrentColor.B - TempColor.B))) > Threshold)
00920                         {
00921                             NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, EdgeColor);
00922                         }
00923                         EdgeSet = true;
00924                     }
00925                 }
00926             }
00927             return NewBitmap;
00928         }

00963             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempImage, TempImage.Width, TempImage.Height);

00969 
00979         public static Bitmap SinWave(Bitmap Image, float Amplitude, float Frequency, bool XDirection, bool YDirection)
00980         {
00981             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
00982             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00983             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00984             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00985             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00986             for (int x = 0; x < NewBitmap.Width; ++x)
00987             {
00988                 for (int y = 0; y < NewBitmap.Height; ++y)
00989                 {
00990                     double Value1=0;
00991                     double Value2=0;
00992                     if (YDirection)
00993                         Value1 = Math.Sin(((x * Frequency) * Math.PI) / 180.0d) * Amplitude;
00994                     if (XDirection)
00995                         Value2 = Math.Sin(((y * Frequency) * Math.PI) / 180.0d) * Amplitude;
00996                     Value1 = y - (int)Value1;
00997                     Value2 = x - (int)Value2;
00998                     while (Value1 < 0)
00999                         Value1 += NewBitmap.Height;
01000                     while (Value2 < 0)
01001                         Value2 += NewBitmap.Width;
01002                     while (Value1 >= NewBitmap.Height)
01003                         Value1 -= NewBitmap.Height;
01004                     while (Value2 >=NewBitmap.Width)
01005                         Value2 -= NewBitmap.Width;
01006                     NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, Image.GetPixel((int)Value2, (int)Value1));
01007                 }
01008             }
01009             return NewBitmap;
01010         }

01050         public static Bitmap Jitter(Bitmap Image, int MaxJitter)
01051         {
01052             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
01053             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
01054             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
01055             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
01056             NewGraphics.Dispose();
01057             Random TempRandom = new Random();
01058             for (int x = 0; x < NewBitmap.Width; ++x)
01059             {
01060                 for (int y = 0; y < NewBitmap.Height; ++y)
01061                 {
01062                     int NewX=TempRandom.Next(-MaxJitter, MaxJitter);
01063                     int NewY = TempRandom.Next(-MaxJitter, MaxJitter);
01064                     NewX += x;
01065                     NewY += y;
01066                     
01067                     if (NewX >= NewBitmap.Width)
01068                         NewX = NewBitmap.Width - 1;
01069                     else if (NewX < 0)
01070                         NewX = 0;
01071 
01072                     if (NewY >= NewBitmap.Height)
01073                         NewY = NewBitmap.Height - 1;
01074                     else if (NewY < 0)
01075                         NewY = 0;
01076 
01077                     NewBitmap.SetPixel(NewX, NewY, Image.GetPixel(x,y));
01078                 }
01079             }
01080             return NewBitmap;
01081         }

01104         public static Bitmap MedianFilter(string FileName, int Size)
01105         {
01106             if (!IsGraphic(FileName))
01107                 return new Bitmap(1, 1);

01109             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempImage, TempImage.Width, TempImage.Height);

01115 
01121         public static Bitmap MedianFilter(Bitmap Image, int Size)
01122         {
01123             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
01124             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
01125             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
01126             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
01127             NewGraphics.Dispose();
01128             Random TempRandom = new Random();
01129             int ApetureMin = -(Size / 2);
01130             int ApetureMax = (Size / 2);
01131             for (int x = 0; x < NewBitmap.Width; ++x)
01132             {
01133                 for (int y = 0; y < NewBitmap.Height; ++y)
01134                 {
01135                     List<int> RValues = new List<int>();
01136                     List<int> GValues = new List<int>();
01137                     List<int> BValues = new List<int>();
01138                     for (int x2 = ApetureMin; x2 < ApetureMax; ++x2)
01139                     {
01140                         int TempX = x + x2;
01141                         if (TempX >= 0 && TempX < NewBitmap.Width)
01142                         {
01143                             for (int y2 = ApetureMin; y2 < ApetureMax; ++y2)
01144                             {
01145                                 int TempY = y + y2;
01146                                 if (TempY >= 0 && TempY < NewBitmap.Height)
01147                                 {
01148                                     Color TempColor = TempBitmap.GetPixel(TempX, TempY);
01149                                     RValues.Add(TempColor.R);
01150                                     GValues.Add(TempColor.G);
01151                                     BValues.Add(TempColor.B);
01152                                 }
01153                             }
01154                         }
01155                     }
01156                     RValues.Sort();
01157                     GValues.Sort();
01158                     BValues.Sort();
01159                     Color MedianPixel = Color.FromArgb(RValues[RValues.Count / 2],
01160                         GValues[GValues.Count / 2], 
01161                         BValues[BValues.Count / 2]);
01162                     NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, MedianPixel);
01163                 }
01164             }
01165             return NewBitmap;
01166         }

01187         public static Bitmap Equalize(string FileName)
01188         {
01189             if (!IsGraphic(FileName))
01190                 return new Bitmap(1, 1);
01191             System.Drawing.Image TempImage = System.Drawing.Image.FromFile(FileName);
01192             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempImage, TempImage.Width, TempImage.Height);

01198 
01203         public static Bitmap Equalize(Bitmap Image)
01204         {
01205             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
01206             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
01207             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
01208             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
01209             NewGraphics.Dispose();
01210             RGBHistogram TempHistogram = new RGBHistogram(NewBitmap);
01211             TempHistogram.Equalize();
01212             for (int x = 0; x < NewBitmap.Width; ++x)
01213             {
01214                 for (int y = 0; y < NewBitmap.Height; ++y)
01215                 {
01216                     Color Current=NewBitmap.GetPixel(x,y);
01217                     int NewR = (int)TempHistogram.R[Current.R];
01218                     int NewG = (int)TempHistogram.G[Current.G];
01219                     int NewB = (int)TempHistogram.B[Current.B];
01220                     if (NewR >= 256)
01221                         NewR = 255;
01222                     if (NewG >= 256)
01223                         NewG = 255;
01224                     if (NewB >= 256)
01225                         NewB = 255;
01226                     NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, Color.FromArgb(NewR, NewG, NewB));
01227                 }
01228             }
01229             return NewBitmap;
01230         }

01270         public static Bitmap Dilate(Bitmap Image, int Size)
01271         {
01272             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
01273             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
01274             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
01275             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
01276             NewGraphics.Dispose();
01277             Random TempRandom = new Random();
01278             int ApetureMin = -(Size / 2);
01279             int ApetureMax = (Size / 2);
01280             for (int x = 0; x < NewBitmap.Width; ++x)
01281             {
01282                 for (int y = 0; y < NewBitmap.Height; ++y)
01283                 {
01284                     int RValue = 0;
01285                     int GValue = 0;
01286                     int BValue = 0;
01287                     for (int x2 = ApetureMin; x2 < ApetureMax; ++x2)
01288                     {
01289                         int TempX = x + x2;
01290                         if (TempX >= 0 && TempX < NewBitmap.Width)
01291                         {
01292                             for (int y2 = ApetureMin; y2 < ApetureMax; ++y2)
01293                             {
01294                                 int TempY = y + y2;
01295                                 if (TempY >= 0 && TempY < NewBitmap.Height)
01296                                 {
01297                                     Color TempColor = TempBitmap.GetPixel(TempX, TempY);
01298                                     if (TempColor.R > RValue)
01299                                         RValue = TempColor.R;
01300                                     if (TempColor.G > GValue)
01301                                         GValue = TempColor.G;
01302                                     if (TempColor.B > BValue)
01303                                         BValue = TempColor.B;
01304                                 }
01305                             }
01306                         }
01307                     }
01308                     Color TempPixel = Color.FromArgb(RValue, GValue, BValue);
01309                     NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, TempPixel);
01310                 }
01311             }
01312             return NewBitmap;
01313         }

01359                     new float[] {.393f, .349f, .272f, 0, 0},

01413         public static Bitmap BoxBlur(Bitmap Image, int Size)
01414         {
01415             Filter TempFilter = new Filter(Size, Size);
01416             for (int x = 0; x < Size; ++x)
01417             {
01418                 for (int y = 0; y < Size; ++y)
01419                 {
01420                     TempFilter.MyFilter[x, y] = 1;
01421                 }
01422             }
01423             return TempFilter.ApplyFilter(Image);
01424         }

01506 
01512         public static Bitmap KuwaharaBlur(Bitmap Image, int Size)
01513         {
01514             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
01515             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
01516             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
01517             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
01518             NewGraphics.Dispose();
01519             Random TempRandom = new Random();
01520             int[] ApetureMinX = { -(Size / 2), 0, -(Size / 2), 0 };
01521             int[] ApetureMaxX = { 0, (Size / 2), 0, (Size / 2) };
01522             int[] ApetureMinY = { -(Size / 2), -(Size / 2), 0, 0 };
01523             int[] ApetureMaxY = { 0, 0, (Size / 2), (Size / 2) };
01524             for (int x = 0; x < NewBitmap.Width; ++x)
01525             {
01526                 for (int y = 0; y < NewBitmap.Height; ++y)
01527                 {
01528                     int[] RValues = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
01529                     int[] GValues = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
01530                     int[] BValues = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
01531                     int[] NumPixels = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
01532                     int[] MaxRValue = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
01533                     int[] MaxGValue = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
01534                     int[] MaxBValue = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
01535                     int[] MinRValue = { 255, 255, 255, 255 };
01536                     int[] MinGValue = { 255, 255, 255, 255 };
01537                     int[] MinBValue = { 255, 255, 255, 255 };
01538                     for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
01539                     {
01540                         for (int x2 = ApetureMinX[i]; x2 < ApetureMaxX[i]; ++x2)
01541                         {
01542                             int TempX = x + x2;
01543                             if (TempX >= 0 && TempX < NewBitmap.Width)
01544                             {
01545                                 for (int y2 = ApetureMinY[i]; y2 < ApetureMaxY[i]; ++y2)
01546                                 {
01547                                     int TempY = y + y2;
01548                                     if (TempY >= 0 && TempY < NewBitmap.Height)
01549                                     {
01550                                         Color TempColor = TempBitmap.GetPixel(TempX, TempY);
01551                                         RValues[i] += TempColor.R;
01552                                         GValues[i] += TempColor.G;
01553                                         BValues[i] += TempColor.B;
01554                                         if (TempColor.R > MaxRValue[i])
01555                                         {
01556                                             MaxRValue[i] = TempColor.R;
01557                                         }
01558                                         else if (TempColor.R < MinRValue[i])
01559                                         {
01560                                             MinRValue[i] = TempColor.R;
01561                                         }
01562 
01563                                         if (TempColor.G > MaxGValue[i])
01564                                         {
01565                                             MaxGValue[i] = TempColor.G;
01566                                         }
01567                                         else if (TempColor.G < MinGValue[i])
01568                                         {
01569                                             MinGValue[i] = TempColor.G;
01570                                         }
01571 
01572                                         if (TempColor.B > MaxBValue[i])
01573                                         {
01574                                             MaxBValue[i] = TempColor.B;
01575                                         }
01576                                         else if (TempColor.B < MinBValue[i])
01577                                         {
01578                                             MinBValue[i] = TempColor.B;
01579                                         }
01580                                         ++NumPixels[i];
01581                                     }
01582                                 }
01583                             }
01584                         }
01585                     }
01586                     int j = 0;
01587                     int MinDifference = 10000;
01588                     for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
01589                     {
01590                         int CurrentDifference = (MaxRValue[i] - MinRValue[i]) + (MaxGValue[i] - MinGValue[i]) + (MaxBValue[i] - MinBValue[i]);
01591                         if (CurrentDifference < MinDifference && NumPixels[i] > 0)
01592                         {
01593                             j = i;
01594                             MinDifference = CurrentDifference;
01595                         }
01596                     }
01597 
01598                     Color MeanPixel = Color.FromArgb(RValues[j] / NumPixels[j],
01599                         GValues[j] / NumPixels[j],
01600                         BValues[j] / NumPixels[j]);
01601                     NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, MeanPixel);
01602                 }
01603             }
01604             return NewBitmap;
01605         }

01645         public static Bitmap SNNBlur(Bitmap Image, int Size)
01646         {
01647             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
01648             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
01649             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
01650             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
01651             NewGraphics.Dispose();
01652             Random TempRandom = new Random();
01653             int ApetureMinX = -(Size / 2);
01654             int ApetureMaxX = (Size / 2);
01655             int ApetureMinY = -(Size / 2);
01656             int ApetureMaxY = (Size / 2);
01657             for (int x = 0; x < NewBitmap.Width; ++x)
01658             {
01659                 for (int y = 0; y < NewBitmap.Height; ++y)
01660                 {
01661                     int RValue = 0;
01662                     int GValue = 0;
01663                     int BValue = 0;
01664                     int NumPixels=0;
01665                     for (int x2 = ApetureMinX; x2 < ApetureMaxX; ++x2)
01666                     {
01667                         int TempX1 = x + x2;
01668                         int TempX2 = x - x2;
01669                         if (TempX1 >= 0 && TempX1 < NewBitmap.Width && TempX2 >= 0 && TempX2 < NewBitmap.Width)
01670                         {
01671                             for (int y2 = ApetureMinY; y2 < ApetureMaxY; ++y2)
01672                             {
01673                                 int TempY1 = y + y2;
01674                                 int TempY2 = y - y2;
01675                                 if (TempY1 >= 0 && TempY1 < NewBitmap.Height && TempY2 >= 0 && TempY2 < NewBitmap.Height)
01676                                 {
01677                                     Color TempColor = TempBitmap.GetPixel(x, y);
01678                                     Color TempColor2 = TempBitmap.GetPixel(TempX1, TempY1);
01679                                     Color TempColor3 = TempBitmap.GetPixel(TempX2, TempY2);
01680                                     if (Distance(TempColor.R, TempColor2.R, TempColor.G, TempColor2.G, TempColor.B, TempColor2.B) <
01681                                         Distance(TempColor.R, TempColor3.R, TempColor.G, TempColor3.G, TempColor.B, TempColor3.B))
01682                                     {
01683                                         RValue += TempColor2.R;
01684                                         GValue += TempColor2.G;
01685                                         BValue += TempColor2.B;
01686                                     }
01687                                     else
01688                                     {
01689                                         RValue += TempColor3.R;
01690                                         GValue += TempColor3.G;
01691                                         BValue += TempColor3.B;
01692                                     }
01693                                     ++NumPixels;
01694                                 }
01695                             }
01696                         }
01697                     }
01698                     Color MeanPixel = Color.FromArgb(RValue / NumPixels,
01699                         GValue / NumPixels,
01700                         BValue / NumPixels);
01701                     NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, MeanPixel);
01702                 }
01703             }
01704             return NewBitmap;
01705         }

01744         public static Bitmap Sharpen(Bitmap Image)
01745         {
01746             Filter TempFilter = new Filter(3,3);
01747             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 0] = -1;
01748             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 2] = -1;
01749             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 0] = -1;
01750             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 2] = -1;
01751             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 1] = -2;
01752             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 0] = -2;
01753             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 1] = -2;
01754             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 2] = -2;
01755             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 1] = 16;
01756             return TempFilter.ApplyFilter(Image);
01757         }

01796         public static Bitmap Emboss(Bitmap Image)
01797         {
01798             Filter TempFilter = new Filter(3, 3);
01799             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 0] = -2;
01800             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 1] = -1;
01801             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 0] = -1;
01802             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 1] = 1;
01803             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 1] = 1;
01804             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 2] = 1;
01805             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 2] = 2;
01806             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 2] = 0;
01807             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 0] = 0;
01808             return TempFilter.ApplyFilter(Image);
01809         }

01848         public static Bitmap SobelEmboss(Bitmap Image)
01849         {
01850             Filter TempFilter = new Filter(3, 3);
01851             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 0] = -1;
01852             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 1] = 0;
01853             TempFilter.MyFilter[0, 2] = 1;
01854             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 0] = -2;
01855             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 1] = 0;
01856             TempFilter.MyFilter[1, 2] = 2;
01857             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 0] = -1;
01858             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 1] = 0;
01859             TempFilter.MyFilter[2, 2] = 1;
01860             TempFilter.Offset = 127;
01861             return TempFilter.ApplyFilter(Image);
01862         }

01865         #region Private Functions
01866         private static double Distance(int R1,int R2,int G1,int G2,int B1,int B2)
01867         {
01868             return Math.Sqrt(((R1-R2)*(R1-R2))+((G1-G2)*(G1-G2))+((B1-B2)*(B1-B2)));
01869         }
